H0.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1932. E.M. Forster

H1.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1932. Virginia Woolf

H2.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1932. D.H. Lawrence

H3.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1932. Galsworthy

A4.text: In late 1932 he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature, only the second English author to receive the award since its inception in 1901.
